component.text:
Select one or more of the network types that support each scenario.

Check the box to classify each scenario as using the intranet, extranet and/or Internet.
Correct, you successfully identified the network types. Click Next to continue.

Incorrect. Remember that an intranet is a private network for employees only. An extranet extends the intranet beyond the bounds of employees to allow suppliers, customers and others to connect. The Internet is the global network of networks and is not under the control of any one group or individual.
1.Juan sends a message to Carlos who is in another branch office of the same company.
2. Deidra conducts research on a competitors product by going to their public web site.
3. Tyco uses his password to connect to a company's web site to check the status of his order
4. Janis connects to the departmental email server from home using her ISP connection.
5. Carlos is repairing the manager’s laptop computer and connects to www.cisco.com to research the network card.
